result.eng: He was a lecturer in mathematics.
result.html: Ba léachtóir le matamaitic éHe was a lecturer in mathematics.
result.ponchtml: Ba léaċtóir le matamaitic éHe was a lecturer in mathematics.

result.eng: My favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ga: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.orig: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoil
result.html: Is í an mhatamaitic an t-ábhar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.
result.ponchtml: Is í an ṁatamaitic an t-áḃar is ansa liom ar scoilMy favourite subject at school is mathematics.

result.eng: It cannot be denied that mathematics has a beauty.
result.ga: Ní féidir a shéanadh go bhfuil áilleacht ag an matamaitic
result.orig: Ní féidir a shéanadh go bhfuil áilleacht ag an matamaitic
result.html: Ní féidir a shéanadh go bhfuil áilleacht ag an matamaiticIt cannot be denied that mathematics has a beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir a ẛéanaḋ go ḃfuil áilleaċt ag an matamaiticIt cannot be denied that mathematics has a beauty.

result.eng: His uncles were teaching mathematics to him.
result.ga: Bhí a uncailí ag teagasc matamaitice dó
